  • Method Details

    • createOrder

      @Transactional public OrderDTO createOrder(CreateOrderDTO dto)
      Description copied from interface: OrderService
      Creates a new order based on the provided data.

      The products associated with the order are blocked for 30 minutes upon creation. If the order is not paid within this period, it will be removed. Throws BusinessException if there are some Products in stock issues.

      Specified by:
      createOrder in interface OrderService
      Parameters:
      dto - the data transfer object containing order creation details
      Returns:
      the created order as an OrderDTO

    • cancelOrder

      @Transactional public void cancelOrder(Long orderId)
      Description copied from interface: OrderService
      Cancels an existing order by its ID. Throws EntityNotFoundException if there is not such Order with ID in the system. Throws BusinessException if there is an attempt to cancel an order that is not in the CREATED status.
      Specified by:
      cancelOrder in interface OrderService
      Parameters:
      orderId - the ID of the order to cancel

    • payOrder

      @Transactional public void payOrder(Long orderId)
      Description copied from interface: OrderService
      Marks an order as paid by its ID.

      This action must occur within 30 minutes of order creation to prevent expiration. Throws EntityNotFoundException if there is not such Order with ID in the system. Throws BusinessException if there is an attempt to pay an Order that is not in the CREATED status.

      Specified by:
      payOrder in interface OrderService
      Parameters:
      orderId - the ID of the order to mark as paid

    • expireOrderById

      @Transactional public void expireOrderById(Long orderId)
      Description copied from interface: OrderService
      Expires an order by its ID, removing it from the system.

      Typically used when an order is not paid within the 30-minute window. Throws EntityNotFoundException if there is not such Order with ID in the system.

      Specified by:
      expireOrderById in interface OrderService
      Parameters:
      orderId - the ID of the order to expire

    • findProductsByIds

      @Cacheable(value="products", key="#productIds") public List<Product> findProductsByIds(Set<Long> productIds)

    • asyncLog

      @Async public void asyncLog(String message, Object... args)

    • executeWithRetry

      private void executeWithRetry(Runnable operation)
      Executes a given operation with retry logic in case of OptimisticLockException. The operation is retried up to MAX_RETRIES times with exponential backoff.
      Parameters:
      operation - The operation to execute, provided as a Runnable.
      Throws:
      BusinessException - if the operation fails after all retries or if interrupted.

    • getOrderWithLock

      @Lock(OPTIMISTIC) private Order getOrderWithLock(Long orderId)
      Retrieves an Order by its ID with an optimistic lock to prevent concurrent modifications.
      Parameters:
      orderId - The ID of the order to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Order entity.
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - if no order is found with the given ID.

    • releaseReservedStock

      private void releaseReservedStock(Order order)
      Releases the reserved stock for all products associated with the given order. Iterates through the order's products and increments their stock quantities.
      Parameters:
      order - The Order entity whose products' stock needs to be released.

    • extractProductIds

      private Set<Long> extractProductIds(CreateOrderDTO dto)
      Extracts product IDs from the CreateOrderDTO.
      Parameters:
      dto - The CreateOrderDTO containing the order items.
      Returns:
      A Set of product IDs extracted from the DTO.

    • fetchProductsWithLock

      private Map<Long,Product> fetchProductsWithLock(Set<Long> productIds)
      Fetches products by their IDs with a lock to ensure data consistency during order processing.
      Parameters:
      productIds - The set of product IDs to fetch.
      Returns:
      A Map of product IDs to Product entities.

    • validateStockAvailability

      private void validateStockAvailability(CreateOrderDTO dto, Map<Long,Product> productMap)
      Validates stock availability for the products in the order. Checks if products exist and have sufficient stock for the requested quantities.
      Parameters:
      dto - The CreateOrderDTO containing the order items.
      productMap - A Map of product IDs to Product entities.
      Throws:
      BusinessException - if stock validation fails.

    • getErrors

      private static List<String> getErrors(CreateOrderDTO dto, Map<Long,Product> productMap)
      Generates a list of error messages for products that are either not found or have insufficient stock.
      Parameters:
      dto - The CreateOrderDTO containing the order items.
      productMap - A Map of product IDs to Product entities.
      Returns:
      A List of error messages.

    • createNewOrder

      private Order createNewOrder()
      Creates a new Order entity with the CREATED status and current timestamp.
      Returns:
      The newly created Order entity.

    • reserveStockAndCreateOrderProducts

      private List<OrderProduct> reserveStockAndCreateOrderProducts(CreateOrderDTO dto, Map<Long,Product> productMap, Order order)
      Reserves stock for the products in the order and creates corresponding OrderProduct entities. Updates the stock quantities in the product map and associates products with the order.
      Parameters:
      dto - The CreateOrderDTO containing the order items.
      productMap - A Map of product IDs to Product entities.
      order - The Order entity to associate with the products.
      Returns:
      A List of OrderProduct entities.

    • saveOrderAndProducts

      private void saveOrderAndProducts(Collection<Product> products, Order order, List<OrderProduct> orderProducts)
      Saves the order and its associated products to the database. Persists updated product stock quantities and links order products to the order.
      Parameters:
      products - The Collection of Product entities to save.
      order - The Order entity to save.
      orderProducts - The List of OrderProduct entities to associate with the order.

    • scheduleOrderExpiration

      private void scheduleOrderExpiration(Long orderId)
      Schedules an expiration event for the order using the OrderExpirationProducer.
      Parameters:
      orderId - The ID of the order to schedule for expiration.
